      • waitForElement

        public MacacaClient waitForElement(java.lang.String using,
                                   java.lang.String value,
                                   int timeout,
                                   int interval)
                            throws java.lang.Exception

        Search for element at specific interval during given time
        Support: Android iOS Web(WebView)

        Parameters:
        using - The way for find an element,eg:"name","xpath","css","id"
        value - The value for the specific way
        timeout - Total time for searching
        interval - Time interval between searching
        Returns:
        The currently instance of MacacaClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public boolean isElementExist(java.lang.String using,
                              java.lang.String value)

        Support: Android iOS Web(WebView)

      • moveTo

        public MacacaClient moveTo(int xoffset,
                           int yoffset)
                    throws java.lang.Exception

        Move the mouse by an offset of the specificed element.
        Support: Android

        Parameters:
        xoffset - X offset to move to, relative to the top-left corner of the element. If not specified, the mouse will move to the middle of the element.
        yoffset - Y offset to move to, relative to the top-left corner of the element. If not specified, the mouse will move to the middle of the element.
        Returns:
        The currently instance of MacacaClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • swipe

        public MacacaClient swipe(int startX,
                          int startY,
                          int endX,
                          int endY,
                          int duration)
                   throws java.lang.Exception

        Swipe on the touch screen using finger motion events.
        Support: Android iOS

        Parameters:
        startX - The X coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        startY - The Y coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        endX - The X coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        endY - The Y coordinate to position the window at, relative to the upper left corner of the screen
        duration - The duration of the swipe operation
        Returns:
        The currently instance of MacacaClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                       throws java.lang.Exception
